(ASO) Client is not familiar with COBRA Initial Notice requirements.

(ASO) Review Paychex COBRA Service. Set up as needed.

(ASO) Review Paychex Workers' Compensation insurance, Workers Compensation Reporting Service, and Workers Compensation Payment Service.
Client is not familiar with an Employee Assistance Program (EAP).
Review BalanceWorks Employee Assistance Program. Schedule employee rollout meeting.
(PEO) Client is not familiar with how Paychex PEO manages their COBRA process.
(PEO) Review PEO COBRA Service.
(PEO) Client is not using Paychex PEO Workers' Compensation insurance and is not familiar with the process to submit renewals of COI (certificate of insurance).
(PEO) Review process to submit renewals of certificate of insurance (COI) for WC. (For clients who self-retain their WC insurance only.)

Review basics of employer responsibilities under Healthcare Reform (ESR, young adult coverage, W2 reporting, FSAs, etc.)
Client does not offer a retirement plan to employees.
Review Paychex retirement plan options.
Client is new to Paychex Retirement Services and/or Paychex HR Services and requires a 401k Client Contact Meeting.

Client does not have an ERISA bond for their retirement plan.
Review ERISA bond requirements. Possible PIA referral.
(ASO) Client does not offer life insurance to employees.
(ASO) Discuss life insurance. Possible referral to Paychex Agency.
Client does not offer an employer match or Safe Harbor as part of their retirement plan.
If non-Paychex 401k plan, refer client to recordkeeper re: matching/Safe Harbor. If Paychex plan, cover matching during 401k CCM.
Client does not understand compliance testing.
If non-Paychex 401k plan, refer client to recordkeeper re: compliance. If Paychex plan, cover compliance testing during 401k CCM.
Client does not offer a Wellness program to employees.
Review the ENI Wellness program.
Client does not have a compensation plan or formal process for determining pay.
Provide compensation surveys for client’s positions.
Review Compensation Planning Seminar/Compensation Manual.
Client needs more information related to the FLSA and applicable state laws related to compensation.
Review the FLSA & similar laws on compensation.
Client needs more information related to determining FLSA status of their positions.
Review how to classify positions under the FLSA (exempt v non-exempt).
Client has interns but does not know the DOL rules regarding interns.
Review DOL rules regarding paid v unpaid interns.
Client needs more information related to independent contractors.
Review independent contractor seminar/guidelines.
(ASO) Client does not offer STD/LTD insurances to employees.
(ASO) Discuss STD/LTD insurances. Possible referral to Paychex Agency.
Client does not offer any employee-paid supplemental insurances to employees.
Discuss employee-paid supplemental insurances. Possible referral to Paychex Agency or Worksite Solutions.
Client is not familiar with Working Advantage program.
Review Working Advantage program. Schedule employee rollout meeting.
(ASO-PIA/PEO) Client is not familiar with BalanceCare (health advocate) program.
(ASO-PIA/PEO) Review BalanceCare program. Schedule employee rollout meeting.
(ASO) Client does not offer a Section125-Premium Only Plan (POP).
(ASO) Review Section 125-Premium Only Plans.
Client does not offer a Section 125-Flexible Spending Account or Health Savings Account.
Review Paychex Benefit Account (PBA) options.
Client does not offer an FSA debit card option to employees.
(ASO) If not PBA, review debit card offering through Paychex plan.
Client does not have a safety program in place.
(ASO) Discuss development of a Safety Program - refer to Paychex Safety Department for program development.
Employees do not receive regular safety training.
(ASO) Review available safety trainings - refer to Paychex Safety Department for development of safety training schedule.
Client is unsure if the company is meeting OSHA safety requirements.
(ASO) Discuss basics of OSHA safety requirements/training - refer to Paychex Safety Department.
Client has had at least one employee accident/incident in the past 3 years and does not have a formal process for how to address these items.
(ASO) Discuss the basics of accident/injury management - refer to Paychex Safety Department.
Client does not have a formal Emergency Preparedness Plan.
(ASO) Discuss the basics of Emergency Preparedness - refer to Paychex Safety Department for plan development.
Based on industry, some employees are required to wear Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).
(ASO) Personal Protective Equipment - refer to Paychex Safety Department for review of requirements for industry.
Client is unsure if the required OSHA posting (federal poster) is available for employees and applicants to access.
(ASO) Conduct Labor Poster Audit.
Client is unsure of the exact OSHA recordkeeping requirements and if they are currently compliant with these requirements.
(ASO) Discuss OSHA recordkeeping and provide forms, tools, and resources.
Completed

Flow.description: Allows the user to choose client Initatives to identify need areas, solutions and tasks to meet the solutions
Flow.label: HR Action Plan

fields.name: UpdateComplete
fields.fieldText: Update Complete, please close this window and refresh the HR Action Plan window to see the updated field values. If any of the information is incorrect, clear out the fields and choose the button again.

fields.name: EFRR_Task_1_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Company does not maintain an employee file for each employee.
Recommendation: Create a template new hire employee file.
Actions:
{!EFRR_Action_1}

fields.name: EFRR_Task_2_Text_0
fields.fieldText:
Need: - Company does not maintain an employee file for each employee AND/OR Client is not aware of federal recordkeeping requirements for employee files
Recommendation: Review employee recordkeeping requirements
Actions:
{!EFRR_Action_2}

fields.name: EFRR_Task_3_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client is not aware of federal retention guidelines and best practices for destroying employee files.
Recommendation: Review employee record retention guidelines.
Actions:
{!EFRR_Action_3}

fields.name: EFRR_Task_4_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client does not maintain separate employee files based on types of employee information and who has access AND/OR Employee files are not reviewed annually for compliance with recordkeeping and retention guidelines.
Recommendation: Conduct employee file audit.
Actions:
{!EFRR_Action_4}

fields.name: EFRR_Task_5_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client is not sure if they are using the current version of the I9 and company representative has not been trained on I-9 completion. AND/OR Client does not keep completed I9’s in a separate central file.
Recommendation: Review Form I9 guidelines and/or conduct I9 client seminar.
Actions:
{!EFRR_Action_5}

fields.name: EFRR_Task_6_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client uses E-Verify but does not know/understand all of the requirements.
Recommendation: Educate client on E-Verify.
Actions:
{!EFRR_Action_6}

fields.name: EFRR_Task_7_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client does not have a process for keeping applications/resumes on file.
Recommendation: Review retention guidelines for hiring process documents.
Actions:
{!EFRR_Action_7}

screens.name: Employee_Files_and_Record_Retention_Needs
screens.label: Employee Files and Record Retention Needs

fields.name: Employee_Relations_Need_Areas_Text
fields.fieldText: Please choose the need areas for Employee Relations

fields.name: ER_Choice_1
fields.fieldText: Company does not communicate policies to employees

fields.name: ER_Choice_2
fields.fieldText: Company does not have a consistent process for handling policy violations

fields.name: ER_Choice_3
fields.fieldText: Company does not have an Employee Handbook

fields.name: ER_Choice_4
fields.fieldText: Company’s Employee Handbook has not been reviewed/updated in the past 12 months

fields.name: ER_Choice_5
fields.fieldText: Company does not have a written process for resolving employee complaints or grievances

fields.name: ER_Choice_6
fields.fieldText: Company does not have a formal Disability or Leave of Absence policy

fields.name: ER_Choice_7
fields.fieldText: Company does not have a written policy prohibiting discrimination, harassment, or retaliation

fields.name: ER_Choice_8
fields.fieldText: Company does not have a written process specifically for resolving employee harassment complaints.

fields.name: ER_Choice_9
fields.fieldText: Managers and employees have not been trained on the company’s discrimination, non-harassment, or retaliation policies in the past year

fields.name: ER_Choice_10
fields.fieldText: Company does not have an internal procedure for investigating employee complaints

fields.name: ER_Choice_11
fields.fieldText: Company has not identified and trained an internal point person to investigate complaints and incidents

fields.name: ER_Choice_12
fields.fieldText: Company does not have a progressive discipline policy/procedure or utilize standard discipline forms

fields.name: ER_Choice_13
fields.fieldText: Supervisors and managers have not been trained on employee discipline and termination

fields.name: ER_Choice_14
fields.fieldText: Company does not have a process for providing references for terminated employees

fields.name: ER_Choice_15
fields.fieldText: Company is not comfortable with current trends/rate of employee turnover

fields.name: Employment_Laws_Action_1_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client and/or managers are not familiar with federal employment laws applicable to client’s business.
Recommendation: Review federal employment laws.
Actions:
{!EL_Action_1}

fields.name: Employment_Laws_Action_2_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client and/or managers are not familiar with state and local employment laws applicable to client’s business.
Recommendation: Review state and local employment laws.
Actions:
{!EL_Action_2}

fields.name: Employment_Laws_Action_3_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client/Managers need additional training on employment laws (general or specific).
Recommendation: Review available management seminars and develop schedule for delivery
Actions:
{!EL_Action_3}

fields.name: Employment_Laws_Action_4_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Company has had an EEO, DOL or state employee relations claim in the past and would like to review best practices for responding to claims and complaints.
Recommendation: Review ways to respond to employee claims and complaints.
Actions:
{!EL_Action_4}

fields.name: Employment_Laws_Action_5_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client is unsure if each of the client’s worksite locations has updated federal and state labor law posters hung in a conspicuous area as required by state and federal laws.
Recommendation: Conduct labor law poster audit.
Actions:
{!EL_Action_5}

fields.name: Employment_Laws_Action_6_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client is required to file an EEO-1 Report each year.
Recommendation: Review EEO-1 reporting.
Actions:
{!EL_Action_6}

fields.name: Employment_Laws_Action_7_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client has employees under the age of 18.
Recommendation: Review child labor laws for each state.
Actions:
{!EL_Action_7}

fields.name: Employment_Laws_Need_Areas_Text
fields.fieldText: Please choose the need areas for Employment Laws

fields.name: Employment_Laws_Needs_Choice_1
fields.fieldText: Client and/or managers are not familiar with federal employment laws applicable to client’s business

fields.name: Employment_Laws_Needs_Choice_2
fields.fieldText: Client and/or managers are not familiar with state and local employment laws applicable to client’s business

fields.name: Employment_Laws_Needs_Choice_3
fields.fieldText: Client/Managers need additional training on employment laws (general or specific)

fields.name: Employment_Laws_Needs_Choice_4
fields.fieldText: Company has had an EEO, DOL or state employee relations claim in the past and would like to review best practices for responding to claims and complaints

fields.name: Employment_Laws_Needs_Choice_5
fields.fieldText: Client is unsure if each of the client’s worksite locations has updated federal and state labor law posters hung in a conspicuous area as required by state and federal laws

fields.name: Employment_Laws_Needs_Choice_6
fields.fieldText: Client is required to file an EEO-1 Report each year

fields.name: Employment_Laws_Needs_Choice_7
fields.fieldText: Client has employees under the age of 18

fields.name: Employee_Separation_Need_Areas_Text
fields.fieldText: Please choose the need areas for Employee Separation

fields.name: ES_Choice_1
fields.fieldText: Client is unsure of process for handling unemployment claims in some or all of their applicable states.

fields.name: ES_Choice_2
fields.fieldText: Client is interested in SUI Service but not all POA/ROAs have been completed for all the client’s applicable states.

fields.name: ES_Choice_3
fields.fieldText: Client does not conduct exit interviews or does not have a process in place to do so.

fields.name: ES_Choice_4
fields.fieldText: Client does not have a formal process for responding to employee reference requests and/or does not have a point person who has been trained in this area.

fields.name: ES_Choice_5
fields.fieldText: Client is unsure of potential unemployment paperwork requirements upon employee separation for the states in which the company operates.

fields.name: ES_Choice_6
fields.fieldText: Client is unsure of potential employee separation paperwork requirements for the states in which the company operates.

fields.name: ES_Choice_7
fields.fieldText: Client is not familiar with state employment laws related to final pay and employee termination for the states in which the company operates.

fields.name: ES_Choice_8
fields.fieldText: Client has provided severance to terminated employees in the past but does not have a formal severance agreement.

fields.name: ES_Choice_9
fields.fieldText: Client has conducted (or is planning to conduct) a reduction in force but does not have a formal process for doing so.

fields.name: ER_Task_1_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Company does not communicate policies to employees AND/OR Company does not have a consistent process for handling policy violations AND/OR Company does not have an Employee Handbook
Recommendation: Review development of an Employee Handbook and scheduling
Actions:
{!ER_Action_1}

fields.name: ER_Task_10_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Company does not have a process for providing references for terminated employees.
Recommendation: Review best practices for providing references.
Actions:
{!ER_Action_10}

fields.name: ER_Task_11_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Company is not comfortable with current trends/rate of employee turnover.
Recommendation: Review possible reasons for employee turnover and ways to address.
Actions:
{!ER_Action_11}

fields.name: ER_Task_2_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Company’s Employee Handbook has not been reviewed/updated in the past 12 months.
Recommendation: Transfer client's current Employee Handbook into Paychex format.
Actions:
{!ER_Action_2}

fields.name: ER_Task_3A_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Company does not have a written process for resolving employee complaints or grievances.
Recommendation: Review resources on Forms Online to assist client with process development for resolving complaints.
Actions:
{!ER_Action_3_A}

fields.name: ER_Task_3B_Text
fields.fieldText:
Recommendation: Develop Talk to Us policy for managing complaints.
Actions:
{!ER_Action_3_B}

fields.name: ER_Task_4_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Company does not have a formal Disability or Leave of Absence policy.
Recommendation: Discuss development of Disability/Leaves of Absence policies.
Actions:
{!ER_Action_4}

fields.name: ER_Task_5_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Company does not have a written policy prohibiting discrimination, harassment, or retaliation AND/OR Company does not have a written process specifically for resolving employee harassment complaints.
Recommendation: Develop No Harassment/Sexual Harassment policies and review applicable training/posting requirements.
Actions:
{!ER_Action_5}

fields.name: ER_Task_6_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Managers and employees have not been trained on the company’s discrimination, non-harassment, or retaliation policies in the past year.
Recommendation: Conduct Avoiding Discrimination and Non Harassment seminar(s) for managers and supervisors.
Actions:
{!ER_Action_6}

fields.name: ER_Task_7_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Company does not have an internal procedure for investigating employee complaints AND/OR Company has not identified and trained an internal point person to investigate complaints and incidents.
Recommendation: Conduct Conducting Workplace Investigations seminar with key individual(s).
Actions:
{!ER_Action_7}

fields.name: ER_Task_8_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Company does not have a progressive discipline policy/procedure or utilize standard discipline forms.
Recommendation: Review available progressive discipline resources.
Actions:
{!ER_Action_8}

fields.name: ER_Task_9_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Company does not have a progressive discipline policy/procedure or utilize standard discipline forms AND/OR Supervisors and managers have not been trained on employee discipline and termination.
Recommendation: Conduct Effective Employee Discipline & Termination seminar with managers and supervisors..
Actions:
{!ER_Action_9}

fields.name: ES_Task_1_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client is unsure of process for handling unemployment claims in some or all of their applicable states.
Recommendation: Review SUI claims process for each applicable state.
Actions:
{!ES_Action_1}

fields.name: ES_Task_2_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client is interested in SUI Service but not all POA/ROAs have been completed for all the client’s applicable states.
Recommendation: Conduct POA/ROA audit.
Actions:
{!ES_Action_2}

fields.name: ES_Task_3_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client does not conduct exit interviews or does not have a process in place to do so.
Recommendation:Review best practices and resources for exit interviews.
Actions:
{!ES_Action_3}

fields.name: ES_Task_4_Text_0
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client does not have a formal process for responding to employee reference requests and/or does not have a point person who has been trained in this area.
Recommendation: Review best practices for responding to employee reference requests.
Actions:
{!ES_Action_4}

fields.name: ES_Task_5_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client is unsure of potential unemployment paperwork requirements upon employee separation for the states in which the company operates.
Recommendation: Review state-specific unemployment paperwork and requirements.
Actions:
{!ES_Action_5}

fields.name: ES_Task_6_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client is unsure of potential employee separation paperwork requirements for the states in which the company operates.
Recommendation: Review state-specific employee separation paperwork and requirements.
Actions:
{!ES_Action_6}

fields.name: ES_Task_7_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client is not familiar with state employment laws related to final pay and employee termination for the states in which the company operates.
Recommendation: Review state-specific final pay requirements.
Actions:
{!ES_Action_7}

fields.name: ES_Task_8_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client has provided severance to terminated employees in the past but does not have a formal severance agreement.
Recommendation: Review best practices for severance agreements and the importance of legal review.
Actions:
{!ES_Action_8}

fields.name: ES_Task_9_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client has conducted (or is planning to conduct) a reduction in force but does not have a formal process for doing so.
Recommendation: Review/Conduct Reduction-in-Force Seminar.
Actions:
{!ES_Action_9}

fields.name: NEO_Task_1_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Hiring manager(s) have not been trained on requirements related to new hire documentation.
Recommendation: Review new hire documentation requirements.
Actions:
{!NEO_Action_1}

fields.name: NEO_Task_2_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Company does not use a new hire checklist for onboarding new employees.
Recommendation: Review use of new hire checklist.
Actions:
{!NEO_Action_2}

fields.name: NEO_Task_3_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Company does not have/use asset logs to track property given to new employees.
Recommendation: Review use of Company Property and Assets Log.
Actions:
{!NEO_Action_3}

fields.name: NEO_Task_4_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Company does not maintain acknowledgement receipts for Company Handbook.
Recommendation: Review importance of maintaining signed Employee Handbook acknowledgements.
Actions:
{!NEO_Action_4}

fields.name: NEO_Task_5_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Company does not have an established, standard orientation program for new employees.
Recommendation: Develop a new employee orientation program.
Actions:
{!NEO_Action_5}

fields.name: NEO_Task_6_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: New employees are not always provided with a job description for their positions when hired.
Recommendation: Discuss best practices and uses of job descriptions with new employees.
Actions:
{!NEO_Action_6}

fields.name: NEO_Task_7_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Company uses employment agreements but does not know the best practices or legal risks related to their use.
Recommendation: Discuss best practices for employee agreements and the importance of legal review.
Actions:
{!NEO_Action_7}

fields.name: NEO_Task_8_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Some employees handle confidential information and need to be trained.
Recommendation: Schedule/Conduct the Protecting Confidential Information Training for necessary employees.
Actions:
{!NEO_Action_8}

fields.name: NEO_Need_Text
fields.fieldText: Please choose the need areas for New Employee Onboarding

fields.name: NEO_Choice_1
fields.fieldText: Hiring manager(s) have not been trained on requirements related to new hire documentation.

fields.name: NEO_Choice_2
fields.fieldText: Company does not use a new hire checklist for onboarding new employees.

fields.fieldText: Company does not have/use asset logs to track property given to new employees.

fields.fieldText: Company does not have an established, standard orientation program for new employees.

fields.fieldText: New employees are not always provided with a job description for their positions when hired.

fields.fieldText: Company uses employment agreements but does not know the best practices or legal risks related to their use.

fields.name: NEO_Choice_8
fields.fieldText: Some employees handle confidential information and need to be trained.

fields.name: Payroll_and_Online_Services_Action_1_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: (HR Solutions) Client does not offer Direct Deposit to employees and wants to know more.
Recommendation: (HR Solutions) Review of Direct Deposit and options (by HR Generalist or Payroll Specialist).
Actions:
{!PaOS_Action_1}

fields.name: Payroll_and_Online_Services_Actions_2_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client is not familiar with how garnishments are handled.
Recommendation: Review of Garnishments and process (by HR Generalist or Payroll Specialist).
Actions:
{!PaOS_Action_2}

fields.name: Payroll_and_Online_Services_Action_3_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client contact is not set up with administrator access to online services (Paychex Flex/MyPaychex).
Recommendation: Set up client for use of online service(s).
Actions:
{!PaOS_Action_3}

fields.name: Payroll_and_Online_Services_Action_4_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client contact would like training on navigation and/or use of online services.
Recommendation: Train client contact on use of online service(s).
Actions:
{!PaOS_Action_4}

fields.name: Payroll_and_Online_Services_Action_5_Text
fields.fieldText:
Need: Client contact would like training on navigation and/or use of HR Online (for self and/or others).
Recommendation: Set up and train client/employees on use of HR Online.
Actions:
{!PaOS_Action_5}

screens.name: Payroll_and_Online_Services_Need_Areas
screens.label: Payroll and Online Services Need Areas

fields.name: Payroll_and_Online_Services_Need_Areas_Text
fields.fieldText: Please choose the Need Areas for Payroll and Online Services

fields.name: Payroll_and_Online_Services_Choice_1
fields.fieldText: (HR Solutions) Client does not offer Direct Deposit to employees and wants to know more

fields.name: Payroll_and_Online_Services_Choice_2

fields.name: Payroll_and_Online_Services_Choice_5
fields.fieldText: Client contact would like training on navigation and/or use of HR Online (for self and/or others)

fields.name: Performance_Management_Need_Areas_Text
fields.fieldText: Please choose the need areas for Performance Management

fields.name: PM_Choice_1
fields.fieldText: Company does not have a formal performance appraisal process

fields.name: PM_Choice_2
fields.fieldText: Company performance expectations and evaluations are not communicated on a consistent basis

fields.name: PM_Choice_3
fields.fieldText: Employees do not complete a self-review as part of the performance appraisal process

fields.name: PM_Choice_4
fields.fieldText: Employee performance feedback is not provided and/or documented consistently by managers and supervisors

fields.name: PM_Choice_5
fields.fieldText: Managers and supervisors have not been trained to provide performance feedback or conduct performance appraisals

fields.name: PM_Choice_6
fields.fieldText: Company either does not provide performance-based merit increases or does not base merit increases on consistent performance measures

fields.name: PM_Choice_7
fields.fieldText: Company does not have a plan for the factors (performance, goals, behavior, etc.) on which to base merit increases

fields.name: PM_Task_1_Text

fields.name: PM_Task_4_Text
fields.fieldText:
